thread.title: North Korea says it will stop nuclear tests

title: North Korea says it will stop nuclear tests
text:
North Korea says it will stop nuclear tests 1:40am BST - 01:31 
North Korea said Saturday it will suspend nuclear and missile tests effective immediately and abolish a nuclear test site and President Donald Trump immediately tweeted ''Big Progress! Look forward to our Summit:''.   
North Korea said Saturday it will suspend nuclear and missile tests effective immediately and abolish a nuclear test site and President Donald Trump immediately tweeted "Big Progress! Look forward to our Summit:".  //reut.rs/2qPZCrp
